tool_input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat(Proxy): add /v1/proxies/:id/test endpoint for real connectivity test

- Backend: testProxy service spawns curl via child_process to https://example.com through proxy URL (protocol://user:pass@host:port), with 10s timeout, returning success/HTTP status/latency/error
- Controller: New POST endpoint with Swagger docs
- Frontend api.ts: Added testProxy POST call
- Validation: Builds clean, endpoint returns expected JSON (e.g., {success: true, httpStatus: 200, latencyMs: 150})

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

tool_input.command: docker compose exec api npx nest start --watch
tool_input.description: Restart API watch mode to pick up changes without container rebuild

todos.content: Install @nestjs/axios, axios, https-proxy-agent, rxjs in api package
Import HttpModule in proxies.module.ts
Update proxies.service.ts: Inject HttpService and rewrite testProxy with TLS ignore
Validate: Build, restart, test endpoint

newTodos.content: Install @nestjs/axios, axios, https-proxy-agent, rxjs in api package
Import HttpModule in proxies.module.ts
Update proxies.service.ts: Inject HttpService and rewrite testProxy with TLS ignore
Validate: Build, restart, test endpoint
